critical_workflows: Product Search and Detail Page Access

test_scenarios.name: Verify Homepage Loads Successfully
steps: Open https://www.pfizer.com in a web browser.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The Pfizer homepage loads completely without errors.

test_scenarios.name: Navigate to News Section
steps: Open https://www.pfizer.com in a web browser.
Locate the 'News' link in the main navigation.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The user is redirected to the 'News' section of the website.

test_scenarios.name: Search for a Product and Access Details
steps: Open https://www.pfizer.com in a web browser.
Enter a valid product name (e.g., 'Comirnaty') in the search bar.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results are displayed, including the product 'Comirnaty'.
follow_up_steps: Click on the search result for 'Comirnaty'
test_scenarios.follow_up_expected_result: The user is redirected to the product details page for 'Comirnaty'.
